message: I'm not even sure if this needs a topic, but I'm wondering: what are you going to name this when you're done? Personally, I think realRiven sounds kind of dumb, so I was wondering what you were thinking. Maybe just Riven, instead of Riven: The Sequel To Myst. Or perhaps something like, Riven RT (real time).
Um, okay, I guess I never saw that. He he... Anyway, I don't really like the name 'realRiven'.
I agree with you. I would rather have the game itself say just "Riven", but the "box art," so to speak, should include some reference to it being a real-time 3d version.
Since it probably won't have any discs, and if any there will only be one, and no individual frames, I would suggest calling it 'merged'.
Well, if one thing can be said for sure it's this: in the intro scene, the huge title will definitely read "RIVEN" and nothing else.
Also, the "merged" thing was a joke. In case hypothetical people didn't know.
I'm thinking the final title when the game is all but complete will likely be realRiven. I think the team agrees that Starry Expanse refers to the project in progress.
Yeah... but I still think it sounds kind of odd, since 'real' and 'riven' start with the same letter. But whatever you want, this is just my 'two cents worth'.

Nah, if it's possible to call it realRiven then it should be. That would just make sense continuing on from realMyst (I never liked that name either, but it's something we're quite used to now). The only question is, will Cyan back the project -- it would only feel right to call it "realRiven" with their blessing.
Does anyone know how to attach a photo to a convore post?
lets go back plenty of years and call it .....drum roll..... Riven 3D! (just joking)
